title: [Large-Scale] Design-Based Learning and Mentoring Expertise Development Program for Remote Education Instructors

context.prior_knowledge: Over one year of online teaching experience with beginner-level domain expertise
context.additional_context: Targeting current science teachers struggling with student-centered lesson design and digital tool utilization

learning_goals: Participants can complete student-centered remote lesson designs applying the Design-Based Learning (DBL) framework.
Through mentoring, learners can apply two strategies for improving online learning engagement in actual classes.
Learners can provide peer feedback on lesson designs using a digital tool integration assessment rubric.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
